attributes.action: Bring back dog licencing. Help protect dogs and owners!
attributes.additional_details: Licencing will help keep tabs on dogs of reputable breeders and owners. Keeping dogs and puppies safe from mistreatment, neglect, abandonment from irresponsible owners.
attributes.background: Bring back dog licencing to help keep all dogs and dog owners safe. Stop dogs going to irresponsible, unknowledgeable and under-researched owners, who buy dogs without knowing anything about the breed. Stop breaders profiting from selling puppies, back-street breeding and puppy farms.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/643650
Bring back a Dog Licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence
